    def get_data(self):
        data = pd.read_csv(self.csv_file, parse_dates=['Date'])
        return data

    def get_data_frame(self, data):
        data_frame = data.copy()
        data_frame['Date'] = data_frame['Date'].dt.strftime("%m/%d/%Y")
        data_frame['Open'] = data_frame['Open'].astype(float)
        data_frame['High'] = data_frame['High'].astype(float)
        data_frame['Low'] = data_frame['Low'].astype(float)
        data_frame['Close'] = data_frame['Close'].astype(float)
        data_frame['Adj Close'] = data_frame['Adj Close'].astype(float)
        data_frame['Volume'] = data
